attributes.action: Stop enslaving the six and a half million carers who save this country sixty five billion pounds per year and get nothing in return
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government have failed to listen to carers in this country, carers out of all the social groups suffer some of the worst financial hardship, we do not deserve to be treated like modern day slaves which we are at the moment, it is time this government recognised the real contribution that carers make to this country, the government must pay carers a living allowance, you must not give with one hand and take away with another which you do at the moment, we can not live on forty eight pounds per week, stop the slavery now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
